metadata.title: CVE-2017-9146 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The TNEFFillMapi function in lib/ytnef.c in libytnef in ytnef through 1.9.2does not ensure a nonzero count value before a certain memory allocation,which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-basedbuffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via a crafted tnef file.

criterions.comment: libytnef: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
